title: Bloomberg Markets:  Tarleton Says Consumers Like Experiences
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets:  Tarleton Says Consumers Like Experiences
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson.\u0010\u0010GUEST:\u0010Marissa Tarleton\u0010Retail Analyst and Chief Marketing Officer\u0010RetailMeNot \u0010Discussing trends and findings from Holiday Insights Guide, including that people may be out shopping, but perhaps it’s also for a treat for themselves, not just their kids.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
